name: Precognition
description: By analyzing information around you, from subtle hints to seemingly disconnected facts, you learn to weave a string of probabilities in an instant that gives you extraordinary insights.
focus: While focused on this discipline, you have advantage on initiative rolls.

abilities.name: Precognitive Hunch
abilities.description: As a bonus action, you open yourself to receive momentary insights that improve your odds of success; until your concentration ends, whenever you make an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, you roll a d4 and add it to the total.

abilities.name: All Around Sight
abilities.description: In response to an attack hitting you, you use your reaction to impose disadvantage on that attack roll, possibly causing it to miss.

abilities.name: Danger Sense
abilities.description: As an action, you create a psychic model of reality in your mind and set it to show you a few seconds into the future. Until your concentration ends, you can’t be surprised, attack rolls against you can’t gain advantage, and you gain a +10 bonus to initiative.

abilities.name: Victory Before Battle
abilities.description: When you roll initiative, you can use this ability to grant yourself and up to five creatures of your choice within 60 feet of you a +10 bonus to initiative.
